name: Furniture Genius
description:
I got Inspired by an amazing boardgame called Genius Square, and I have made my interpretation of it for the Game jam which theme was "SPACE"

The "Space" is what you need to find in this game by fitting all the furnitures inside a 6x6 room.

Commands:

ESC-to open the menu

x/z - mirror the forniture on the respective axis

r - rotate the forniture

LeftCLick - move forniture

RightClick - reset forniture

Good Luck!

Kenney art available here: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/furniture-kit
